basic_information.scholarship_name: Emma Plunkett Junior Physical Education Undergrad Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: Emma Plunkett Junior Physical Education Undergrad

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to female students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing undergraduate teaching degrees in physical education. The amount awarded and number of recipients for this scholarship will be determined by the amount available in the fund at the time of the selection. NOTE: Any student awarded this scholarship may, and must, reapply to receive the scholarship in subsequent years, thus making the scholarship unavailable to new applicants, other than incoming freshman. For clarity, check with the KHS department chair. Eligibility Requirements This scholarship is open to junior female students Minimum 2.8 overall GPA Pursuing a Health/Physical Education teaching degree Active membership in the UCO KHS Club & the OAHPERD Involvement in the Kinesiology & Health Studies departmental activities Demonstrate commitment to a physically active & fit lifestyle Demonstrate appropriate behavior reflective of a professional person. Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship
